documents.document: @jonculshaw You need to sign up to Weather Watchers on the BBC (then I might have...)
@MPComplainer Yes, it's not massively comprehensive but it's there...
Happy New Year! Happy Rooster! Happy Wendy, when @rizlateef had a go at Mandarin! https://t.co/vZRo0oHPJY
@RizLateef @MPComplainer Good time to use it...
@MPComplainer @RizLateef Sheer relief that she did it so I didn't have to (potentially saying something rude I didn't mean to say...)
@RizLateef speaks Mandarin doncha know! https://t.co/jFO8J2NSqg
Almost the year of the rooster! Chiswick House and Gardens honours a 2000 years Chinese tradition. More at 6.30pm https://t.co/UzXaa6cKy5
@NickGodwinsport So it was just my timing that was off!
@MPComplainer They're still live but from another studio while we get our camera fixed...
@sleepysilvery @BBCWthrWatchers I just liked the little City building tops poking out...
This is what the fog looks like from a plane... #weatherwatchers https://t.co/kueNhdjn03
@Dlambert66 @jonculshaw @MadameTussauds Ha! Yes, it's the loose waistband/cowboy pose...
@adam01966 @jonculshaw @MadameTussauds It did feel like he was really glaring and would suddenly come to life and tell us we were a disgrace
A strange and brilliant morning in the company of a waxy Trump and @jonculshaw at @MadameTussauds. More at 6.30pm https://t.co/qmZ8WFmDI4
@MPComplainer I owed them one!
@123reg And we're back up!
This lil late team want someone to win the football. Otherwise we're here for a while... @RizLateef @emiliapapsâ€¦ https://t.co/xtmiPLqDIv
@SimondoBath @EllieEEngland @emiliapaps @RizLateef To be honest, I don't mind who winds. So long as someone does. Within the first 90 mins.
@123reg I hope this is just a blip - I transferred to you only yesterday! #someoneputtheplugbackin!
@MPComplainer Exactly! (It was three in the end - shoehorned a News Channel into the middle...)
I've found a place at least 20C warmer than anywhere else in London and look who I have for company! https://t.co/JsRM7CKR6N
I'm somewhere a bit warmer today... https://t.co/kJSZlT6EmS
@ColinWallis3 It was a physical demonstration of how hideous the weather was. And no, today I'm going somewhere toasty. Do tune in!
@JFenneberg @bbcweather Oh I'm not falling for that again - I'm going somewhere warn. Stay tuned!
@JFenneberg @bbcweather It's like this: https://t.co/87Pz29IYFK
@champagne_dave I'm a Ninja. And I grew up in the countryside. I'm built for this stuff!
@XJSPORT1 @BBCNews My legs got soaked. Steaming on the tube home...
It's coming! https://t.co/rMMIilm9Jk
@CoxeyLoxey @zuffle THAT'S High Wycombe right now?! Up on the hill!
@zuffle There's no pleasing some people ;-)
@CliveHasTheHorn Still the possibility of many many flakes.
@NudeCyclist DO NOT get fired on our behalf. Or cold and wet. But I'd love to see some flakes!
Back edge of the rain is turning to snow at places like High Wycombe. We could well get some flakes around 6pm in London #snow
@NudeCyclist Hi! Can you take picture of the snow where you are? I can't tell you how much it would make my day x
@HistoricFFRacer Wet sleet is rubbish. Cold, wet, you can't make a ball out of it. Glad I'm not the only none chasing snow today...
@maljacqpr Quite likely though whether it settles is so difficult to say...
@dudleyplatypus Crowdsourcing/social media? That's the Weather Watchers remit...
Luscious Louise Lear explains why this snow thing is tricky: https://t.co/j7u0k47U6k #snow
@dudleyplatypus Twitter doesn't pay for content either.
@James_Scoltock Don't promise him snowmen and sledging just yet - it may not settle. Still, exciting to see snow!
Weather Watchers! We'll likely see snow today - maybe A LOT. We need you! Have your cameras ready and upload to: https://t.co/INyCe30uN4
@U615TYoung On weather on Monday but I have my arts hat on at the end of the week as usual x
@U615TYoung @BBCLdnWeather Each run of the model is pushing the probability higher. Not out of the question...
@U615TYoung No, it's a mummy day today...
@Kate_Kinsella Because we love your face x
@U615TYoung @BBCLdnWeather Looking more and more likely, yes. Watch the forecasts today!
@Barry2103 Yes, it was a wry nod to Thursday probably being a totally rubbish day. Stay under the duvet?
2016: in many ways one where discord presides and the good ones died. But she saved my soul. A kiss from Freya forâ€¦ https://t.co/5nbeoMGaZa
I think every mother can understand that her heart broke #RipCarrieandDebbie
@james_jackson01 @SarahKLweather @lizzieweather Squally cold front I would imagine but I'm sure my esteemed colleagues know for sure...
@cowpatman Can you tell my boss? ðŸ˜‚
@Sidders72 Your daughters, is it? Mr Fairy Lights. You don't fool me...
@cpjenson You are so sweet and I would but so am I! Have a fabulous time xx
@james_jackson01 Draw the curtsins so the neighbours don't see The Tree Of Shame. It's such a beautiful tree too. Amazon delivering Tues...
@OldHilly Darn it! Thanks for the offer. We've ordered some from Amazon, coming Tues. Until then tis The Tree Of Shame #curtainsdrawn
@DavinaHagan I'm glad I didn't get this before it shut or I might've been tempted! The car park rage on Black Friday ðŸ˜± - imagine Xmas Eve!
@james_jackson01 We tried three. All sold out.
Ever tried to find Christmas lights on Christmas Eve? We've been to six shops. We'll stick a lamp under it or something... #canyouseethetree
@emiliapaps That is desperately sad for them and anyone else who has been through it ðŸ˜¢
@SarahFMorris Great news! It massively helped. You're going to be an obsessive bouncer by new year!
@McKennaSusie @Vimeo @HackneyEmpire It was easy to write and edit with so much colour and humour on film! Happy Xmas and enjoy your day off!
I made a nuisance of myself backstage at the Hackney Empire with Sleeping Beauty's cast and creator. Oh yes I did! https://t.co/WzZVnLOJbe
@HackneyEmpire It's coming together and looking good! You were so accommodating (even after we massively outstayed our welcome!)
@BexWills Gratuitously and at every possible moment...
Backstage with the baddie, Sharon D Clarke in Sleeping Beauty at Hackney Empire. See if I escape tonight at 6.30pm.â€¦ https://t.co/mrfEX3SGwV
Some people who have gone... https://t.co/yhtM1QU2CC
@ranvir01 The washing machine? That's a lot of rice...
"Everything's waiting for you!" https://t.co/nmsGE7lNrd
@GTyler1 Major ear worm!
@TheBillyReeves Thank you for the introduction!
@TheBillyReeves I've spotted it!
@TheBillyReeves Raven released her back catalogue - two CDs in one (like Patchwork + Fancy). Added to wish list!
@TheBillyReeves Argh - how have I now had Bobbie in my life?! Which is the best one to get?
@TheBillyReeves I'm listening to it on the dodgy BBC headphones on You Tube - and it's fantastic! I might have to get it on vinyl...
@TheBillyReeves Thanks x
@TheBillyReeves I should really be, the amount I love second hand books...
@rDaneelOlivaw By me?
@MartinAnglais Yes, slightly.
@PetulaClarkHQ Lovely lady - you will be on BBC London this evening. I hope I have done you justice - it was a great pleasure talking to you
@zuffle I can absolutely believe that!
@TheBillyReeves Tell me, if you had to buy just ONE of her albums - which would it be? This one?
@errongordon I'll be honest - I might not be the best person to ask. I still haven't QUITE finished The Wire...
One of the loveliest people I've met - the ludicrously talented and beautiful Petula Clark. On BBC London c'est soir https://t.co/Twy1HPa0id
@errongordon Audio book? Actually, I haven't got any of those. Ok, let me have a think...
@errongordon @NarcosNetflix @Stranger_Things Want to borrow a book?
@AndyHorn4 Oh thanks! I do try to be funny. I don't often succeed. At least I got one chuckle!
I'd just like you all to know that I survived my dangling over the Thames last week and I am going to rabbit on about the weather in a bit x
@JefferiesMike Superwoman never had her arms tucked in! No She Ra...
@paulross Well that's something! Good to know your dulcet tones are on the waves x
@paulross Back at work after a year of mummying and straight back into the randomness of TV. Zip line over the Thames today. As you do. You?
@jen725 Winging it everyday, you know?!
@jen725 Delicious and nutritious! She loves her nursery days, thankfully. Loads of toys, friends and cuddles...
@hcrreardon A week in and she already does. All smiles at drop off already. I'm so happy for her!
@Ben_garrod I wasn't coming back for any old tat ðŸ˜œ
@paulross And I miss you generally. Tell that little social butterfly to have another gathering, will you?
@MartinAnglais Both again. I'm a lucky (and hard working) lady x
@JennyBarsby Superwoman. That's what I was telling myself...
I'm back! In...erm...style, of sorts. I missed you all so much! https://t.co/9iLfhrHk8h
I felt like superwoman! (In a kind of screaming, terrified, shaking way...) https://t.co/L433oRe7og
Last year I was screaming from the 8th floor. Today I'm zipping at 40mph from the roof. Probably screaming louder... https://t.co/byYL7SEeVN
